resources.string: 小米恢复模式刷机工具
Version: %s
Network Unstable
Unknown Error[%d]
Unable to flash unofficial ROM Package
ROM is under beta testing. Please download a already released ROM package from MIUI Forum
抱歉无法支持回退到非次新以前版本
Unable to flash. Please use the Latest Stable ROM, downloaded from MIUI Forum instead.
Unable to flash. Please use the Latest Developer ROM, downloaded from MIUI Forum instead.
Due to internal issues, this ROM has been deleted.Please download the latest ROM from MIUI Forum instead.
The device is running on Vendor ROM. Please use Fastboot flashing to flash to the Latest Stable ROM, downloaded from MIUI Forum.
Unable to flash between different Android Versions. Please flash ROM via Fastboot Flashing.
The Update Package selected is not for this device. Please choose and download again from MIUI Forum.
Other
10000:Unable to get device specifications
10001:Signature verification failed
10002:Webpage Busy. (IP)
10003:Internal Services failure
10004:Request timeout
Only 1 device can be unlocked every 30 days
The device is not bound to this Mi Account
生成解锁所需的签名值失败
User Avatar resolution too low or contains illegal contents
This Mi Account is not able to unlock devices
Download the newest Mi Unlock Tool
Please wait %d hours before unlocking your device
Maximum device unlocked
